pages.text: You've already used your anvil plenty (lots of anvils, to be precise). [Item Crushing](book://general/anvil_crushing), repairing and enchanting  are burning a hole in your iron supply.\To make the anvil last longer - or even make it indestructible - Bedrock seems like the perfect choice.\Allows you to rename items for free and has no maximum repair limit.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Also enables you to add descriptions to your items.\_Pro tip: type \n to split your text into multiple lines._
